title: Public design leadership opportunity at the heart of government

content.text: The Ministry of Housing, Communities & Local Government is recruiting a new Head of User Centred Policy Design. This is an exciting opportunity to lead the way on public design in one of the UK government's most important departments.
You can find the job advert at: https://www.civilservicejobs.service.gov.uk/csr/jobs.cgi?jcode=1742089
